survey.title: Stack Overflow
survey.description: This survey will cause a stack overflow on some devices.
survey.submitText: Thank you for completing today's survey.

prompt.promptText: The next prompt will be shown if the first prompt was less than this one

prompt.condition: (original1 == 1 and original2 > 1) or (original1 == 2 and original2 > 2) or (original1 == 3 and original2 > 3) or (original1 == 4 and original2 > 4) or (original1 == 5 and original2 > 5) or (original1 == 6 and original2 > 6) or (original1 == 7 and original2 > 7) or (original1 == 8 and original2 > 8) or (original1 == 9 and original2 > 9) or (original1 == 10 and original2 > 10) or (original1 == 11 and original2 > 11) or (original1 == 12 and original2 > 12) or (original1 == 13 and original2 > 13) or (original1 == 14 and original2 > 14) or (original1 == 15 and original2 > 15) or (original1 == 16 and original2 > 16) or (original1 == 17 and original2 > 17) or (original1 == 18 and original2 > 18) or (original1 == 19 and original2 > 19) or (original1 == 20 and original2 > 20) or (original1 == 21 and original2 > 21) or (original1 == 22 and original2 > 22) or (original1 == 23 and original2 > 23) or (original1 == 24 and original2 > 24) or (original1 == 25 and original2 > 25) or (original1 == 26 and original2 > 26) or (original1 == 27 and original2 > 27) or (original1 == 28 and original2 > 28) or (original1 == 29 and original2 > 29) or (original1 == 30 and original2 > 30) or (original1 == 31 and original2 > 31) or (original1 == 32 and original2 > 32) or (original1 == 33 and original2 > 33) or (original1 == 34 and original2 > 34) or (original1 == 35 and original2 > 35) or (original1 == 36 and original2 > 36) or (original1 == 37 and original2 > 37) or (original1 == 38 and original2 > 38) or (original1 == 39 and original2 > 39) or (original1 == 40 and original2 > 40) or (original1 == 41 and original2 > 41) or (original1 == 42 and original2 > 42) or (original1 == 43 and original2 > 43) or (original1 == 44 and original2 > 44) or (original1 == 45 and original2 > 45) or (original1 == 46 and original2 > 46) or (original1 == 47 and original2 > 47) or (original1 == 48 and original2 > 48) or (original1 == 49 and original2 > 49) or (original1 == 50 and original2 > 50)
prompt.promptText: The number of the first prompt was less than the second prompt

survey.title: Binary Condition Tree
survey.description: This is the survey with parenthesis to reduce the depth of the condition by making a binary tree.
survey.submitText: Thank you for completing today's survey.

prompt.promptText: The next prompt will be shown if the first prompt was less than this one

prompt.condition: (((((binary1 == 1 and binary2 > 1) or (binary1 == 2 and binary2 > 2) or (binary1 == 3 and binary2 > 3)) or ((binary1 == 4 and binary2 > 4) or (binary1 == 5 and binary2 > 5) or (binary1 == 6 and binary2 > 6))) or (((binary1 == 7 and binary2 > 7) or (binary1 == 8 and binary2 > 8) or (binary1 == 9 and binary2 > 9)) or ((binary1 == 10 and binary2 > 10) or (binary1 == 11 and binary2 > 11) or (binary1 == 12 and binary2 > 12)))) or ((((binary1 == 13 and binary2 > 13) or (binary1 == 14 and binary2 > 14) or (binary1 == 15 and binary2 > 15)) or ((binary1 == 16 and binary2 > 16) or (binary1 == 17 and binary2 > 17) or (binary1 == 18 and binary2 > 18))) or (((binary1 == 19 and binary2 > 19) or (binary1 == 20 and binary2 > 20) or (binary1 == 21 and binary2 > 21)) or ((binary1 == 22 and binary2 > 22) or (binary1 == 23 and binary2 > 23) or (binary1 == 24 and binary2 > 24) or (binary1 == 25 and binary2 > 25))))) or (((((binary1 == 26 and binary2 > 26) or (binary1 == 27 and binary2 > 27) or (binary1 == 28 and binary2 > 28)) or ((binary1 == 29 and binary2 > 29) or (binary1 == 30 and binary2 > 30) or (binary1 == 31 and binary2 > 31))) or (((binary1 == 32 and binary2 > 32) or (binary1 == 33 and binary2 > 33) or (binary1 == 34 and binary2 > 34)) or ((binary1 == 35 and binary2 > 35) or (binary1 == 36 and binary2 > 36) or (binary1 == 37 and binary2 > 37)))) or ((((binary1 == 38 and binary2 > 38) or (binary1 == 39 and binary2 > 39) or (binary1 == 40 and binary2 > 40)) or ((binary1 == 41 and binary2 > 41) or (binary1 == 42 and binary2 > 42) or (binary1 == 43 and binary2 > 43))) or (((binary1 == 44 and binary2 > 44) or (binary1 == 45 and binary2 > 45) or (binary1 == 46 and binary2 > 46)) or ((binary1 == 47 and binary2 > 47) or (binary1 == 48 and binary2 > 48) or (binary1 == 49 and binary2 > 49) or (binary1 == 50 and binary2 > 50)))))
prompt.promptText: The number of the first prompt was less than the second prompt

survey.title: NOT_DISPLAYED / SKIPPED
survey.description: This is a survey to test behavior of the timestamp prompt type.

survey.title: Negative Condition
survey.description: This survey checks a negative number in a condition.
survey.submitText: Thank you for completing today's survey.

prompt.promptText: Enter a number. The next prompt will be shown on a -8.

message.messageText: The number of the first prompt was -8

survey.title: Single Custom Choice Condition
survey.description: This survey checks a condition on a single custom choice prompt.
survey.submitText: Thank you for completing today's survey.

prompt.displayLabel: A message will be shown for different indexes.
prompt.promptText: The door is locked. Do you:

property.label: hunt in your pockets for the key
